body.p: The approach for standardization of NEMSIS elements has been to rely on the expertise of the twenty professional societies that defined the elements, and to focus on clearly articulating their adaptation to the CDA formalism.
As HL7 offers the expertise of EHR and emergency care professionals, the project team solicits input from these communities.
